website_summaries.verdict: An affordable primer for dry skin that moisturizes while also giving a matte finish.
pros: The gel formula moisturizes and calms dry skin without the heaviness of creams
Gives skin a smooth, matte appearance
Helps makeup stay put and last all day
cons: Not ideal for those who want a more dewy finish

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a trip to Hong Kong and ran out of primer while i was there-____- but I found this brand there and started using it and im SOOOOO glad i did! As soon as I got back to the US I bought 3 of these from Amazon. A little goes a longgg way. You need a tiny bit and it spreads on your skin super nicely. It smells good and it really leaves your skin moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: CLee

customer_reviews.title: But I will say that it is a very good primer. My makeup didn't budge it all
customer_reviews.text: I don't have dry skin so I can't say if this product hydrating for those who may need it. But I will say that it is a very good primer. My makeup didn't budge it all. My eyeshadow was even in tact all day. The consistency isn't like other primers, slippy and silicony which, imo, is a very good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont get scammed!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like it at all. It just gives oil to my skin and thats all. No skin color correction no perfection in the skin. I feel like i got scamed for this. I think the over the counter product in cvs and walgreens way better than this
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Worth it :)
customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER sensitive and combination skin. This product works perfectly with my skin. Keeps my makeup look flawless and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: GGgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I have very dry skin and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have very dry skin and this primer hydrates and helps my makeup stay put! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: TOR C VANG

customer_reviews.title: not sealed?
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the primer was not safety sealed when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Hyon

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cheap perfume
customer_reviews.text: Smells like cheap perfume. I have very sensitive skin and so I don't wear anything with perfume minute. I leaned in to get my husband a kiss and he asked me if I was wearing a bottle of perfume. I decided to push through the smell and give it one shot. It doesn't work at all as a primer either.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Marcos

customer_reviews.title: No problems with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: feels smooth and make up stays put all day. I was hoping for something that would also minimize pores and not seeing that with this. Overall I do like it
customer_reviews.author: justwrite

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Goes on so smoothly and holds the makeup well without looking cakey. I also have very sensitive skin and this didn’t irritate me at all, which a lot of products do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. My makeup just glides on after using this product
customer_reviews.author: karla Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance too strong
customer_reviews.text: It's probably good for someone else, but the fragrance is too strong. Probably not good for sensitive skin or noses. It doesn't smell bad, just strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
